TowerDefense

Class GameObjectPlus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Engine.GameObject
      • TowerDefense.GameObjectPlus
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Destructible, EffectVisual, Projectile, Smoke

    public class GameObjectPlus
extends Engine.GameObject
    This class simply extends GameObject with some additional functionality. Adds some persistence to the concept of animations, and some shortcuts to interact with them.
    Author:
    Branden Drake

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class Engine.GameObject

        Engine.GameObject.AnimationMode

      • startSingleAnim

        public boolean startSingleAnim(AnimationData animData)
        Start an animation that plays once, but only if another single animation isn't already playing.
        Parameters:
        animFile - Filename of the animation to play.
        numFrames - Number of frames in the animation's spritesheet.
        ticksPerFrame - How long to stay on each frame of the animation.
        Returns:
        True if this animation was played.

      • forceSingleAnim
